marklogic.body: This map looks like the old Cold War demonization maps of the Soviet Union's Reach, or the pre-entry propaganda against the Japanese, both imperial powers. So this graphic is saying that 1/3 of the troops are overseas, and 1/3 of that group is in combat, while 8/9ths, nearly 90%, are back 'fighting' for a place in line at the mimosa bar in all-you-can-eat Club Fed, never mind the 6-figure multiples mercs, the Wackenhuts and ... wow, what an incredible looting, the largest Corporation in human history!
